title: Council Implementing Regulation (EU) No 573/2011 of 16 June 2011 implementing Article 16(2) of Regulation (EU) No 204/2011 concerning restrictive measures in view of the situation in Libya
header:
17.6.2011 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 159/5
COUNCIL IMPLEMENTING REGULATION (EU) No 573/2011
of 16 June 2011
implementing Article 16(2) of Regulation (EU) No 204/2011 concerning restrictive measures in view of the situation in Libya
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EU) No 204/2011 of 2 March 2011 concerning restrictive measures in view of the situation in Libya (1), and in particular Article 16(2) thereof,
Whereas:
In view of the developments in Libya, the list of persons and entities subject to restrictive measures set out in Annex III to Regulation (EU) No 204/2011 should be amended,
main_body: The entry for the person set out in the Annex to this Regulation shall be deleted from the list set out in Annex III to Regulation (EU) No 204/2011.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Union.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 June 2011.
For the Council
The President
MARTONYI J.
(1)  OJ L 58, 3.3.2011, p. 1.
ANNEX
Person referred to in Article 1
14. ZARTI, Mustafa
